segments.text: Can I have the window seat over there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , sir . That table has been booked .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , in that case , this table is the only choice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually you can have a window seat if you don't mind a ten-minute wait .
segments.speaker: S2
